messages.title: Living in and committed to Sheffield South East
messages.content: I have worked closely with local schools opposing cuts to our schools' budgets. Class sizes are rising, there are insufficient funds for building maintenance and teaching assistants are losing their jobs. I am committed to ensure that our children and teachers aren't left in the lurch. I want to ensure children restore the education basics to give toddlers the best start in life. I want to abolish tuition fees and restore the full maintenance to University students.

messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content:
Properly fund our NHS and stop Tory and Brexit Party privatisation. 
Have more bobbies on the beat to protect our communities. 
Keep OAP concessions for travel and fuel and free TV licences for over 75s. 
Only vote for a Brexit deal that protects workers rights and jobs. 
Respect our veterans and ensure we implement the Forces covenant.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More funding for Schools and Colleges
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposing cuts to school budgets, addressing class sizes, building maintenance, and job losses for teaching assistants, abolishing tuition fees, restoring full maintenance for university students.

As Chair of the Parliamentary Committee for Housing, I have campaigned for more affordable homes to be built, addressed derelict council houses refurbishment, and supported penalties for bad private sector landlords.
Tackling climate change, supporting young people advocating for the environment, backing Labour's green new deal, improving public transport, and extending the tram network.
